verbs.description: [ARG1: The appetite for bluster and superlatives] [V: displayed] [ARG0: by Donald Trump] must be genetic : his grandfather joined the Klondike stampede and operated a series of restaurants and hotels , invariably boosting them as the newest , neatest and best equipped north of Vancouver.
